title: #351:  Resting Brit Face CODE RED
description:
"Ladies of London" is back! Caroline is on a quest to make Julie cry, but instead she makes us laugh. Come join us as we recap the season 3 premiere. Then it's on to "Below Deck" and "Married to Medicine." Plus, gossip about Scheana Shay, and a casual ranking of Housewives in the Crappens Mailbag.

00:00:00 - Intro
00:06:36 - Gossip!
00:11:20 - Crappens Mailbag / Best & Worst Housewives
00:27:52 - Ladies of London
01:10:20 - Below Deck
01:39:46 - Married to Medicine

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
